issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem isn't valid and it can't be fixed.
resolution.name: Invalid

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We are getting lots of exceptions as below:

0000000189: 192.168.54.6: Feb 07 2017 00:43:19.884 -0300: %_TransportConnection-4-org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection: {Thrd=ActiveMQ Transport: tcp:///127.0.0.1:57291@61616}  Failed to add Connection ID:MPMEDIASENSEFAR-41479-1482180831174-71:1, reason: javax.jms.InvalidClientIDException: Broker: MmcaJmsBroker-MPMEDIASENSEFAR - Client: static://(tcp://localhost:61616?socket.tcpNoDelay=true)_MmcaJmsBroker-MPMEDIASENSEFAR_outbound already connected from tcp://127.0.0.1:60812 
0000000190: 192.168.54.6: Feb 07 2017 00:43:19.884 -0300: %_Service-4-org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.Service: {Thrd=ActiveMQ Transport: tcp:///127.0.0.1:57291@61616}  Async error occurred: javax.jms.InvalidClientIDException: Broker: MmcaJmsBroker-MPMEDIASENSEFAR - Client: static://(tcp://localhost:61616?socket.tcpNoDelay=true)_MmcaJmsBroker-MPMEDIASENSEFAR_outbound already connected from tcp://127.0.0.1:60812 
javax.jms.InvalidClientIDException: Broker: MmcaJmsBroker-MPMEDIASENSEFAR - Client: static://(tcp://localhost:61616?socket.tcpNoDelay=true)_MmcaJmsBroker-MPMEDIASENSEFAR_outbound already connected from tcp://127.0.0.1:60812
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.region.RegionBroker.addConnection(RegionBroker.java:223)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.BrokerFilter.addConnection(BrokerFilter.java:85)
	at org.apache.activemq.advisory.AdvisoryBroker.addConnection(AdvisoryBroker.java:79)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.BrokerFilter.addConnection(BrokerFilter.java:85)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.BrokerFilter.addConnection(BrokerFilter.java:85)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.MutableBrokerFilter.addConnection(MutableBrokerFilter.java:91)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.processAddConnection(TransportConnection.java:712)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.jmx.ManagedTransportConnection.processAddConnection(ManagedTransportConnection.java:80)
	at org.apache.activemq.command.ConnectionInfo.visit(ConnectionInfo.java:139)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.service(TransportConnection.java:294)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection$1.onCommand(TransportConnection.java:152)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.MutexTransport.onCommand(MutexTransport.java:50)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.WireFormatNegotiator.onCommand(WireFormatNegotiator.java:113)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.AbstractInactivityMonitor.onCommand(AbstractInactivityMonitor.java:256)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.TransportSupport.doConsume(TransportSupport.java:83)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.doRun(TcpTransport.java:222)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.run(TcpTransport.java:204)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)
0000000191: 192.168.54.6: Feb 07 2017 00:43:19.885 -0300: %_Service-4-org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.Service: {Thrd=ActiveMQ Transport: tcp:///127.0.0.1:57291@61616}  Async error occurred: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot add a producer to a connection that had not been registered: ID:MPMEDIASENSEFAR-41479-1482180831174-71:1 
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot add a producer to a connection that had not been registered: ID:MPMEDIASENSEFAR-41479-1482180831174-71:1
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.processAddProducer(TransportConnection.java:495)
	at org.apache.activemq.command.ProducerInfo.visit(ProducerInfo.java:105)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.service(TransportConnection.java:294)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection$1.onCommand(TransportConnection.java:152)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.MutexTransport.onCommand(MutexTransport.java:50)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.WireFormatNegotiator.onCommand(WireFormatNegotiator.java:113)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.AbstractInactivityMonitor.onCommand(AbstractInactivityMonitor.java:256)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.TransportSupport.doConsume(TransportSupport.java:83)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.doRun(TcpTransport.java:222)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.run(TcpTransport.java:204)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)
0000000192: 192.168.54.6: Feb 07 2017 00:43:19.885 -0300: %_Service-4-org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.Service: {Thrd=ActiveMQ Transport: tcp:///127.0.0.1:57291@61616}  Async error occurred: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot add a consumer to a connection that had not been registered: ID:MPMEDIASENSEFAR-41479-1482180831174-71:1 
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot add a consumer to a connection that had not been registered: ID:MPMEDIASENSEFAR-41479-1482180831174-71:1
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.processAddConsumer(TransportConnection.java:545)
	at org.apache.activemq.command.ConsumerInfo.visit(ConsumerInfo.java:332)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.service(TransportConnection.java:294)
	at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection$1.onCommand(TransportConnection.java:152)

	at org.apache.activemq.transport.AbstractInactivityMonitor.onCommand(AbstractInactivityMonitor.java:256)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.TransportSupport.doConsume(TransportSupport.java:83)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.doRun(TcpTransport.java:222)
	at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.run(TcpTransport.java:204)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)

Please help to cater this issue.

comments.body: Please direct support questions to the users mailing list.

hi Timothy,

Can you please tell us the concern mailer so that we can send the questions to them?

Thanks Timothy.

So can we send our questions directly on this mailer?

Yes you can send questions to the user's mailing list but you are unlikely to get much help with such an old version.  5.7.0 is very old at this point so I would recommend trying a new version to see if your problem has been resolved already.
